Lay facts:

â€“ He was born in Changsha, Hunan, China.

â€“ Family: Grandparents, whom he lived with when he was a child.

â€“ Education: Hunan Normal University High School

â€“ He used to be a local child star in China, making appearances at many variety shows.

â€“ In 2015 he won 3rd place in TV Star Academy (Hunan Economics TV show).

â€“ In 2008, Lay was cast into SM Entertainment through one of their global audition.

â€“ He was officially introduced as an EXO member on January 17th, 2012.

â€“ He was supposed to be EXO-Mâ€™s leader but it was changed to Kris.

â€“ He arrived at SM the same day as Luhan. Thatâ€™s how they became close.

â€“ Personality: Humble, easy-going, funny, hard-working, mischievous at times, forgetful.

â€“ Lay has a 4D personality.

â€“ On stage, heâ€™s strong and charismatic, but off the stage, he is humorous and playful.

â€“ Habit: He likes to sleep on the living roomâ€™s hard floors. (He says that the temperature is cooler there and that sleeping in a different location allows him to dream different dreams.)

â€“ Lay said his friends used to call him â€˜Da Touâ€™ which means Big Head.

â€“ He speaks Chinese, Korean and English.

â€“ He can practice for a very long time. (At one point, he arrived at SM Entertainment in the early morning, and didnâ€™t live until the dawn of the next day.)

â€“ He is a bit slow to react. An example would be if someone says a joke and everyone else is laughing, Lay would laugh about a minute later (after he understands the joke).

â€“ His hobbies are: cooking, dancing, playing piano and guitar, playing on the computer, mastering the Korean language, composing songs.

â€“ He learned to play the piano by himself.

â€“ He once said that when an EXO member is feeling sad or tired, he would play them a song with his guitar to cheer them up.

â€“ His favorite foods are tidbits, junk food, anything he cooks.

â€“ He loves eating fruits.

â€“ His favorite colors are purple and black.

â€“ He loves cooking. (Like D.O is the cook of EXO-K, Lay is the cook of EXO-M. If thereâ€™s nothing to do, heâ€™ll cook.)

â€“ He likes to write lyrics and compose music.

â€“ He takes the longest time to learn the choregraphies.

â€“ He likes to dance in the dark.

â€“ Yixing first got a cat at 17 years old and it didnâ€™t have a name so he called it â€œCatâ€.

â€“ Lay is afraid of pigeons (basically he is afraid of anything that have beak). XD

â€“ Heâ€™s rather naughty, but heâ€™s really funny at times too.

â€“ Layâ€™s neck is sensitive to wind.

â€“ In SHINeeâ€™s 2010 concert tour, he briefly filled in as Jonghyunâ€™s dance replacement.

â€“ He is the cooking â€œummaâ€ in EXO-M, even when thereâ€™s nothing to do, he will cook.

â€“ He wants to be a producer in the future.

â€“ According to the EXO-M members, Lay is the most different off-stage and on-stage.

â€“ When heâ€™s angry, he will keep it to himself and bottle it up until he explodes.

â€“ He is quite forgetful at times.

â€“ A star he recently got close to is Leo (VIXX) (Star Show 360).

â€“ He established his own charity foundation entitled â€œZhang Yixing Arts Scholarshipâ€.

â€“ Lay is first ambassador of Perrier company in China, first ambassador to the Valentino brand, first ambassador of Milka company, first ambassador of Converse in Asia and Pacific Ocean.

â€“ He acted in Chinese movies: â€œEx Files 2: The Backup Strikes Backâ€ (2015), â€œOh My Godâ€ (2015), â€œKung Fu Yogaâ€ (2017), â€œThe Founding of an Armyâ€ (2017), â€œThe Islandâ€ (2018)

â€“ He acted in the Chinese dramas: â€œThe Mystic Nineâ€ (2016), â€œOperation Loveâ€ (2017), â€œThe Golden Eyesâ€ (2019), â€œEmpress of the Mingâ€ (2019)

â€“ He released his first album â€˜LAY 02 SHEEPâ€™ on October 7, 2017 and all the songs were either written or composed by him.

â€“ Lay released his first mini album â€˜Lose Controlâ€™ on October 28, 2016, and all the songs were written and composed by him.

â€“ Madame Tussauds Wax Museum in Beijing made a wax figure of him in modern clothes and Madame Tussauds Wax Museum in Shanghai also made a wax figure of him, but styled him after the character Er Yue Hong that he played in the drama â€œThe Mystic Nineâ€ (his first leading drama).

â€“ Lay said he would date himself if he was a girl.

â€“ Lay is the MC of Idol Producer.

â€“ He was a mentor in the reality show â€œRave Nowâ€ (2018).

â€“ Lay is ranked 18th on TC Candler â€œThe 100 Most Handsome Faces of 2018â€.

â€“ Layâ€™s ideal type is someone who is cute and filial.
